name: You are a Weapon
description:
As an abnormal creation, with nothing but two weapons and a mere heart, fight off a horde of hateful enemies (pretty silly enemies - who charges at an armed heart without its body...).

Controlls:

Space - click to swap weapons, hold to attack (Because SPACE is the theme!).

Created in 10h, that's why there is no music and still a lot stuff to polish.
All assets (except for the font) by Horun.
